card.name: La Jeanne, White Knight Spirit Knight
card.text: ■ Your light evolution creatures may each cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1.

card.name: Riku, the Oracle
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature, if you have 2 shields or less, you may shieldify the top card of your deck.

card.name: Corteo, Spirit Knight
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, for each of your creatures in the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.

card.name: Gaga Pikarian
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

card.name: Acroite, Start Dash
card.text: ■ Each turn, you may have the first light creature you summon cost 1 less. It can't cost less than 1.

card.name: Akyoora, Crossing Wings
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.

card.name: Andorom, Chanting Wings
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ Mana Arms

card.name: Zodiac, Chanting Cathedral
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose up to 3 of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap them. ■ Mana Arms
